text: in britain a london police officer has
been sentenced to life in prison for the
kidnap rape and murder of a young woman
in a case that has caused anguish across
the uk a court heard how pc wayne
cousins pretended to arrest sarah
everard and used his police handcuffs to
kidnap her from the streets as she
walked home from a friend's house megan
patterson reports
in the aftermath of sarah everard's
murder shock grief and anger were shared
at vigils around the country at her
killer sentencing the chilling details
of her death described as unspeakably
grim the ever-hard family present
throughout proceedings in a statement
her mother susan said she was
broken-hearted the family tormented by
the circumstances of her daughter's
death
arriving at the old bailey this morning
wayne cousins was later sentenced to a
whole life order his actions were
described as warped selfish and brutal a
man who under the guise of his duty as a
police officer picked sarah everard up
in the street as she walked home from a
friend's house in an exchange which
lasted less than five minutes he showed
his warrant card and used knowledge of
covered restriction policing to handcuff
sarah everard and put her in his higher
car
witnesses saw this the moment of the
calculated kidnap they believed wayne
cousins was an officer doing his job
cousins then drove to a remote rural
area where he raped and murdered sarah
everard he's later seen on cctv calmly
continuing with daily life ordering a
hot chocolate in a nearby coffee shop
questioned by police he feigned
innocence knowing he'd put sarah's body
inside a fridge and set it on fire no
sarah i don't know
okay do you know where sarah is
during the sentencing wayne cousins sat
with his head bowed sarah everard's
family asked him to look at them as they
gave their statements sarah everard's
father told him
the horrendous murder of my daughter
sarah is in my mind all the time and
will be for the rest of my life a father
wants to look after his children and fix
everything and you have deliberately and
with premeditation stopped my ability to
do that
a family broken by an imaginable loss a
police force left questioning how it
will recover i'm deeply ashamed i'm
deeply angry
and so inevitably yes that sort of
fragile trust certainly between women
and the police has been fractured yet
further
described as a holy blameless victim to
those who loved her sarah everard will
always be the precious little girl who
became a woman with a beautiful mind
taken cruelly from them by a man who
took advantage of his position megan
patterson bbc news
